Junior mendicants' behavior [sn16.8:7.7]: Senior mendicants invite a mendicant with the qualities of the past to a seat
Junior mendicants observe and practice accordingly
For their lasting welfare and happiness
Junior mendicants' behavior in the prese: Senior mendicants invite a well-known and famous mendicant to a seat
Junior mendicants observe and practice accordingly
For their lasting harm and suffering
